aboutNative.title: CONNECT
aboutNative.description: Build relationships with our Native hosts in intimate experience groups and become stewards to real stories.

aboutNative.title: DISCOVER
aboutNative.description: Grow your knowledge of the world and learn about different traditions and their cultural strengths.

aboutNative.title: EXPERIENCE
aboutNative.description: Have the peace of mind to embark on a boundless adventure with your safety and fulfilment as our utmost priorities.

travellerSlides.title: TEMUAN VILLAGE TRAIL
travellerSlides.description: Catch an intimate glimpse into how nature and culture go hand-in-hand on a fascinating day trip to Kampung Sungai Lalang Bahru, Semenyih.

teamSlides.title: LEARNING TOUR
teamSlides.description: Learn and experience the Indigenous culture and traditions in customized experiences for organisations such as corporates and schools.

aboutNative.title: UNIQUE ADVENTURES
aboutNative.description: Embark on a Native experience led by indigenous communities

aboutNative.title: EXPERT NATIVE HOST
aboutNative.description: Expect personal encounters with local traditions and culture

aboutNative.title: ALL INCLUSIVE PRICING
aboutNative.description: Travel hassle free as transportation, equipment and meals are all provided

whatWeOffer.title: TEMUAN VILLAGE TRAIL
whatWeOffer.description: Situated 50-minutes away from the capital city of Malaysia, guests can expect to learn the tricks of the rainforest and build a deeper connection to the Orang Asli Temuan community through the act of story-telling and cultural exchange.

whatWeOffer.title: GOMBAK INDIGENOUS AFFAIRS
whatWeOffer.description: Based in the largest Orang Asli settlement in Peninsular Malaysia, guests will focus on reviving different aspects of the basecamp with activities ranging from building the structure, putting up the walls, to weaving the roof using traditional Semai tribe methods.
